item.title: Black Lives Matter (Main Page)
item.description: Hereâ€™s an in-depth set of info related to Black Lives Matter for Canadians Beginner Resources If You Feel Overwhelmed Systemic Racism Explained (Video 4:23 length) How to ACTUALLY Stop Police Brutality (Video 11:31 length) Free #DoTheWork 30 Day Course by Rachel Cargle (via email) Antiracism Resources for White People (Google Doc) How to Be an Antiracist by Ibram X. Kendi (Book) A History of Slavery in the United States (Interactive Timeline by National Geographic)
